articles.title: Chinese students welcomed in US to do humanities, Indians for sciences: Diplomat - India Today
articles.description: US Deputy Secretary of State Kurt Campbell said US universities were limiting Chinese students access to sensitive technology given security concerns He said the US needed to recruit more students from India a key security partner and not China
articles.content: The US should welcome more students from China, but to study the humanities rather than sciences, the second-ranked US diplomat said on Monday, noting that US universities were limiting Chinese stude… [+2348 chars]

articles.title: Emergence thinks it can crack the AI agent code - TechCrunch
articles.description: Emergence, a new startup from IBM veterans, has raised close to $100 million for its generative AI agent technology.
articles.content:
Yet another generative AI venture has raised a bundle of money. And, like the others before it, it’s promising the moon.

articles.title: OpenAI buys a remote collaboration platform - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI is buying a video-focused remote collaboration platform, Multi, for an undisclosed amount.
articles.content:
OpenAI is on an M&A tear.

articles.title: Mars Helicopter Ingenuity Spots Perseverance Rover During Flight 51 - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: NASA's Mars helicopter Ingenuity flew for the 51st time. The Perseverance rover can be seen in the distance during the flight in an enhanced color image.   Credit: Space.com | footage courtesy: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta
